pages.text: 藥水釀造機是一種釀造藥水的機器。製造$(l:thermal:technology/potion_fluid)藥水溶液$(/l)而不是直接在瓶子裡釀造。一種材料足以釀造一個藥水桶，其可以裝滿 4 瓶。

pages.title: 增強元件相容性
pages.text: $(li)$(l:thermal:technology/augments/integral_components)整合元件$(/l)$(li)$(l:thermal:technology/augments/item_filter)物品篩選器$(/l)$(li)$(l:thermal:technology/augments/xp_storage)知識濃縮器$(/l)$(li)$(l:thermal:technology/augments/rf_coil)擴展通量線圈$(/l)$(li)$(l:thermal:technology/augments/rf_coil_storage)穩態通量線圈$(/l)$(li)$(l:thermal:technology/augments/rf_coil_xfer)強導通量線圈$(/l)$(li)$(l:thermal:technology/augments/fluid_tank)擴容儲罐構造$(/l)$(li)$(l:thermal:technology/augments/machine_speed)通量鏈結放大器$(/l)$(li)$(l:thermal:technology/augments/machine_efficiency)通量效率升級器$(/l)
